title: 20th Century Medium Condensed Italic?
content:
There doesn't seem to be an italic version of 20th Century Medium Condensed. Does anyone know of a good alternative?  
Thanks!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [20\_century\_md.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023182800/http:/typophile.com/files/20_century_md.gif) | 7.59 KB |
author: kiarostami

comments.content:
Futura has a Medium Condensed Oblique.  
 [http://www.linotype.com/12698/futuramediumcondensedoblique-font.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023182800/http:/www.linotype.com/12698/futuramediumcondensedoblique-font.html "http://www.linotype.com/12698/futuramediumcondensedoblique-font.html")
